content.question: Which expression is equal to the magnitude of the force that one particle exerts on the other?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator k Q squared, and denominator 16 d squared" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mi>k</mi><msup><mi>Q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>16</mn><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator k Q squared, and denominator 2 d squared" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mi>k</mi><msup><mi>Q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 2 k Q squared, and denominator d squared" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>k</mi><msup><mi>Q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 8 k Q squared, and denominator d squared" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mn>8</mn><mi>k</mi><msup><mi>Q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator k Q squared, and denominator 2 d squared" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mi>k</mi><msup><mi>Q</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow></mfrac></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
